11.title: Wolf

111.content:
Fear gripped your throat as he stared up at the impossible. Looming over you writing on a little notepad was a very, very big anthro wolf. The giant seemed to be lost in thought as he stared at the notepad. The fact that he wasn't paying attention to you made you feel a little at ease.

Suddenly the wolf turned around and walked to the other side of the room. His booming footsteps shook you to the core. "Just how big is that thing?!" You thought quickly getting to your feet and running away. You didn't have a plan but you did know that you had to hide somewhere quick. Looking ahead you saw what appeared to be a massive pencil.

As you got closer you realised that you were shorter than the pencils thickness! "Wait, is this world big or am I small in this world?" You wondered. Suddenly you felt the booming footsteps again and they were getting closer. Panicking you ran to around and hid behind the pencil praying the wolf wouldn't see you.

"Yes Carl I understand the materials for the job have been order." The wolf said in a tired voice. Peaking around the corner of your hiding spot you saw he was talking on the phone to someone. "Yes, I will be on site tomorrow." You could make out another voice on the other end of the phone and that person sounded pissed. The wolf and this unknown person talked a little more before the wolf hung up and practically slammed the phone onto the table.

The force caused you to yelp and fall over. "What a dickhead." He growled and reached for the pencil you were hiding behind. Your heart sank when the pencil was taken away revealing your presence. "What the?" The wolf leaned in and snorted in disgust. "Another damn bug?" The wolf crossed his arms. "I've been crushing you little ants all day in my garage I swear that exterminator I called doesn't know how to do his job."

The wolf grabbed a nearby magnifying glass. "Well, lets see what type you are before I introduce you to my boot little guy." He said hovering the massive piece of plastic and glass over you. The wolf leaned in and muttered. "What kinda fucking bug is that?" He wondered. Awkwardly you raised your hand and waved.

The wolf jumped back and yelped in fright. You screamed as the magnifying glassed crashed landed beside you. Thankfully it missed you completely. The wolf slowly approached again and hesitantly reached for the magnifying glass. He hovered it over you again and muttered. "What are you?"

You cleared your throat and said I a polite voice. "H-hello my name is Zack and I'm a human." The wolf just tiled his head. He saw your lips moving but couldn't make out any words. Slowly he leaned his head in closer and hovered his fuzzy ear directly over you. The size difference was terrifying but you managed to choke out. "Hello my name is Zack and I'm a human!" You said louder this time.

The wolf pulled his head away and looked at you in surprise. "Y-you talk!" He boomed above making your ears ring. "Yes! Please don't shout!" You groaned covering your ears. The wolfs ears folded in realization. "Sorry." He said in much quieter.

"So, err what are you, why are you so tiny and why are you in my garage?" You explained to the wolf that you had no idea how you got here and how you don't why your so small and that you just woke up here.

The wolf gave you a funny. "So, your some tiny alien that just magically appeared in my garage?" You rubbed the back of your head. "Sorry but that's really all I know I swear I'm not lying!"

Did the wolf believe you?

To your surprise you saw the skunk wave his free hand in the air as he responded back with, "No need to be shy. Also there's no need to call me or any of others sir, son." You saw that same free hand place itself onto the center of his huge pecs when he added, "But I we'd best introduce ourselves to you. The name's Stan."

"So now that you know our names, what's your's little guy?" Stan asked, which caused you to look back at him.

"Oh, my name's Will. And it's nice to meet all four of you guys." You told the four giant anthros males.

"Well Will, since you seemed to show up out of nowhere I think all four of us can agree that you'll be staying with us in our duplex with us. This way we'll know that you're safe." Roger told you, with a smile on his face.

"Oh, well thank you. But do all of four you really live in a singel duplex together?" You asked.

"Well not exactly." Frank pointed out, which caused you to look over at him. And up doing this he want on with, "Because you see little man, Stan and Roger live on this side of the duplex while Marcus and I live on the other side."

"But since all four of us have been friends for years we all decided to all rent out a duplex together. So we sometimes hang out on either side of the home without any issues." Marcus explained.

"Oh, I see." You let out, as you processed that information.

But while you did this you heard the skunk's voice again when he asked, "However, even though we now have a fifth cute and young little roommate I think each of us should spend some one on one time with you, Will."

"Oh yes, I agree. And it's works out since we each have different jobs that have different schedules." Roger pointed out, with a smile on his face.

"Or maybe the little man wants to spend time with all five of us big sexy daddies?" Frank asked, while he flexed his huge muscled for you.

"I think either option sounds lovely." Marcus agreed.

"So Will what will it be?" Stand asked you, before you saw all four big anthro daddies look at you with excited smiles.

All of this was quite a lot to take in. However, it seemed like your dream with coming true in a way. But now the question was who would you spend time with first?

1451.content:
Coming to, you immediately noticed something was wrong. As you sat up, the ground felt wooden and smooth. Looking up your eyes widened in shock as you saw a dressing room fit for a giant!

There were multiple casual clothes draped over numerous chairs and fancy suits all hung up in a open closet. You soon heard a door click, and looking at the giant inhabitant entering the room, your jaw dropped.

The giant had the body structure of a 6'7 tall man, however his body was covered in yellow fur and his head was that of a Pikachu! Looking at his body you couldn't help but blush. The anthro Pikachu had a defined six pack, a pair of bulging biceps, two large pecs, and a pair of large feet.

He was dressed in a tight orange and black fighting suit that squeezed his muscles, allowing a clear view of them. In his right hand was a mask with the same colors as the suit. The Pikachu ran a paw through his messy hair as he brought his hulking body to a mirror, giving you a view of his muscled back and firm rump.

"They put up a good fight, but In the end I still won!", the anthro spoke passionately as he flexed both of his arms, making the veins bulge out and his tail wag happily. His voice was deep but had an energetic flare to it.

The Pikachu suddenly turned around, walking to the desk you sat on. You watched in amazement as the muscle god began to loom over you. Looking up the face of the Pokemon was mostly covered by his large pecs. You decided getting his attention might be the best choice.

"Um hey! Down here!".

The Pikachu's ear twitch and he looked over his strong chest down at you. At first he squinted his eyes before leaning down. The Pikachu raised an eyebrow at you. "That noise. Was...that you little guy?"

"Um yeah."

The Pikachu's face suddenly lit up as he grinned. "I can't believe it! Can you speak again?"

"H..hello"

The Pikachu let out a cute chu~ as he smiled at you. His eyes suddenly widened and he gasped. "Oh sorry! I haven't introduced myself!"

Clenching a fist, the Pikachu hit his toned chest and grinned. "The names Zapp! I'm the fifth time Pokemon Tournament champion!"

"Well my name is Ryan. And I'm a human."

Zapp looked at you awe. "Whoa! I've never seen your type before, I wonder if there are human type fighters. Are they as tiny as you?!"

You sweatdropped at Zapp's misconception of you being a pokemon. Still you should roll with it. "Um yeah, but I'm not really a fighter."

"Ah I see, hehe I was kinda worried. Fighting you at this size might hurt you....oh but don't worry I'd never hurt you Ryan." Zapp chuckled rubbing the back of his head.

You suddenly felt a wave of sadness. You suddenly are in a new world and tiny. Zapp seems nice but would other pokemon be the same?

"Ryan? You ok man?", Zapp asked concerned.

"Yeah it's just....I don't know how I ended up here and being lost is kinda scary."

You suddenly felt a smooth and furry warmth rub your head. Looking up, you saw Zapp rubbing your head with his thumb pad. He gently smiled at you.

"Hey don't get sad now, I'll tell you what I'll look after you!"

"W-what?"

Zapp gave a toothy smile. "I'll keep you safe Ryan, you won't have to worry when your giant buddy protects you."

Smiling gratefully and blushing, you nodded and Zapp gave a thumbs up
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
After some time, you and Zapp began to chat. Within minutes, the Pikachu acted like everything was normal. He drank from a water bottle and kicked his large feet up on the desk.

"So are all Pokemon in the tournament so....buff?"

"Hmmm not all of them. There have been a few lean champions, my trainer just gives me a strict routine to follow. In the end I get all this!", Zapp smiled as he flexed his biceps and legs.

You kept your head down to hide your blush.

Soon you decided to........

As you looked up, you noticed a few framed pictures on the giant desk. One had an anthro Pichu sitting on Zapp's shoulders. Both were in casual clothes and smiling. The next one had a Raichu in a white tuxedo with a Pikachu in a wedding dress. The Raichu was holding the Pikachu's head to his chest. The last one had Zapp in his fighting outfit, and next to him was an anthro Greninja in a yukata. Zapp had his arm around the Greninja and both were kissing.

"Oh, you're looking at my photos?", Zapp asked, his voice bringing you out of your observing.

You nodded and soon pointed to the photo of the Pichu. You then looked up and over at the giant anthro Pikachu and asked, "Is that your son?"

Zapp chuckled at the question before he replied, "No that's my little brother Spark."

This surprised a little while you followed up the frist question with, "So then, are those your parents?"

"Yeah....they are." Zapp let out, to which you noticed his voice had gained a sad tone to it.

Looking up, you saw the Pikachu looking at the photo with a sad gaze. This prompted you to completely face him before you asked him, "Zapp? Are you okay?"

This question seemed to break him out of his dazed like state as he replied, "Huh? Oh yeah sorry Ryan. It's just....looking at that picture brings up some bad memories."

"What do you mean?", You asked, while you noticed Zapp began to rub his fingers together.

"My parents....passed away a few years ago. Spark was only a baby when it happened.", Zapp explained, to which he rested his fingers back on the desk.

Hearing this caused you to also form a sad expression on your face when you told him, "Oh. I'm sorry Zapp."

Zapp shook his head before he reassured you with, "It's ok. It was hard at first taking care of him and trying to finish school. But luckily I was scouted to become a fighter, and now Spark is one of my best supporters!", Zapp then began to speak passionately again as he crashed his knuckles together and kept on going, "When I hear him cheering for me, i have more then enough strength to win!

You chuckled at his energy as you commented back, "Yeah I can relate in a way."

Right after you had uttered these words though you saw the heaivly muscled Pikachu give you a curious exxpression when he asked, "Oh Ryan, do you have a sibling too?"

"Not exactly. I grew up in a orphanage. Me and a lot of older kids helped take care of the younger ones. Though in the end they were adopted while I wasn't." You explained as the past memories began to plague your mind.

You suddenly felt Zapp scoop you up in his palm, before hugging you by pressing you against his right pectoral. His loud heartbeat and soft fur put you at ease. Both of you sat in silence, though you could hear light sniffling.

You then heard Zapp's voice when he let out, "Thanks for the talk with me, Ryan. It's been a long time since I could open up to someone like this."

After he had told you this Zapp then set you back down on the desk, and you and him smiled at each other.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

After a little bit of time had passed the mood lighten up quite a bit. Zapp had even taken off his top to let his muscled torso breath. You decided to ask about the last picture when you asked him, "So who's that?"

Upon asking this question saw the anthro Pikachu bring up one of his huge arms while he rubbed the back of his and admitted, "That's Kaeru, he's currently my ex."

"Currently?" You wondered, while you tilted your head to the side out of curiosity.

Zapp then moved that same arm away from the back of his neck and scratched his cheek when he confessed, "Yeah, he left to go tour the regions about a month ago. We figured it'd be best to take a break and try to reconcile when he gets back.", Right after this though the Pikachu leaned back in his chair. He suddenly clapped his hands together and looked back down at you and added, "Alright, we visited the past enough for one day!" Zapp placed his palm beside you. And taking the offer you crawl onto the soft paw pad. Standing up from his seat, he made his way to the closet and began to pick an outfit. This made you realize that he seemed to be dressing up to meet someone. You then saw Zapp look down at you again when he went on with, "Hey Ryan, wanna meet....

info.brief_description: A world of giant male anthros awaits you.
info.description:
Hello everyone, here I am with another interactive!

So I've decided to create a macro anthro interactive, after adding to this amazing one here https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1877733-Giant-Anthro-World. It's been a blast and I want to try my hands at it. Shout out to TheGamerSwordsman for helping me be confident in adding furry chapters, thank you my friend.

Now here's the set up, you will pick an anthro and from there you will go anywhere. You a human, are brought to a new world, shrunk and have towering anthropomorphic animals walking around.This world of giant anthros could be a normal city, a fantasy kingdom, or a futuristic world.

I'm also adding Pokemon and Digimon options. You can pick the already anthro ones or you can pick anthro versions.

Update (April 10, 2018)
- Me and TheGamerSwordsman will be putting up edited chapters from the interactive Friendly Male giant pokemon. The reason being new rules have been put up saying that sexual content isn't allowed, so we will edit our chapters slightly and put them here. If you seen those chapters and see them here know that its intentional.

So rules!
- Male interactions only
- Anything goes, except scat or piss
- Keep the ages of characters doing grown up things above 18
- Please add at least a paragraph to chapters

So now, read on and enjoy!
